meanings.definition: Cheap or stingy in quality or appearance.
meanings.sent2: The chintzy fabric felt rough and thin.
meanings.sent3: She tried to impress with her chintzy jewelry.
meanings.sent4: The chintzy decorations made the room look sad.
meanings.sent5: The chintzy paint job peeled off within days.

meanings.sent1: The chintzy outfit clashed with everything.
meanings.sent2: The chintzy furniture was too bright for the room.
meanings.sent3: He thought his chintzy hat was a fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: The chintzy decorations screamed for attention.
meanings.sent5: The chintzy design hurt her eyes with its brightness.

meanings.definition: To be sparing or frugal in spending.
meanings.sent1: She chintzied on buying new clothes.
meanings.sent2: He chintzies when it comes to eating out.
meanings.sent3: They chintzy their way through the sales.
meanings.sent4: Chintzying on gifts saved them money.
meanings.sent5: Chintzying on vacations allowed them to save for a house.
